Name: Context
About the game: Context is a simple clicker style game in which the player explores a randomly generated map. The map is randomly generated for each game session. Complete tasks and defeat enemies by clicking to earn xp (experience points) and level up.
Meta Title: Context: Oct 24, 2019, SunshineOvercast and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Context? Check out the release date (Oct 24, 2019), developer insights from SunshineOvercast, and a complete game summary.
